meanings.sent1: The scientist was dolomitizing the calcium carbonate samples in the lab.
meanings.sent2: The geological process of dolomitizing limestone takes thousands of years.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy chemist accidentally spilled the dolomitizing solution all over the floor.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to be dolomitizing the ancient rocks, turning them into beautiful dolomite formations.

meanings.definition: To undergo the process of converting into dolomite.
meanings.sent1: The limestone was slowly dolomitizing over time.
meanings.sent2: The rock formation was dolomitizing due to the natural chemical reactions.
meanings.sent3: The mountain seemed to be dolomitizing itself, surprising the geologists.
meanings.sent4: The old statue appeared to be dolomitizing, changing its appearance gradually.
meanings.sent5: The ancient ruins were dolomitizing, creating a unique landscape.
